name: Gameboy Advance Video Fire Force Dub
name_original: Gameboy Advance Video Fire Force Dub
description:
Since Atsushi Ōkubo the manga artist finished his manga (22.2.2022), i took my time to make a one from season 1 of Fire Force episodes dub to transform video in gba video and we all wish a season 3 full series to come !

Hope you still support the manga artist in the future.

Hope you like it!
